question: Which among the following group best fits in a definition of a ‘shadow banking system’?
option1: Scheduled Commercial Banks, Non Banking Finance Companies, Hedge Funds
option2: Non banking Finance Companies, Investment banks, Hedge funds
option3: Scheduled Commercial Banks, Private Banks and NBFC’s
option4: Scheduled Commercial banks, Cooperative Banks and Investment Banks
answer: Non banking Finance Companies, Investment banks, Hedge funds
